ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَءَاتِيَةٌ لَّا رَيْبَ فِيهَا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The Hour is coming - there is no doubt about it. But most of mankind have no iman.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The Hour will certainly come; there is no mystery about it; but most men do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The Hour will indeed come; there is no doubt about that. Yet most people do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Hour of Doom will inevitably come, but most people do not have faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the Last Day will surely come, there is no doubt in it – but most people do not accept faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, the Hour is surely coming, there is no doubt about it, yet most men believe not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely the hour is coming, there is no doubt therein, but most people do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The Hour is coming, no doubt of it, but most men do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! the Hour is surely coming, there is no doubt thereof; yet most of mankind believe not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The Final Hour is sure to come, without doubt, but most people do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the Hour is coming: there is no doubt thereof; yet most of mankind believe not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed the Hour is bound to come; there is no doubt in it. But most people do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Hour will certainly come: Therein is no doubt: Yet most men believe not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, the Hour (Day of Judgement) is surely coming, therein is no doubt, yet most men believe not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: There is no doubt that the Hour is coming, yet most people do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Indeed, the Hour is coming; there is no doubt about it; but most people do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - but most of the people do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:59] Truly the Hour is coming; there is no doubt in it. But most people do not believe, in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! the Hour is surely coming, there is no doubt thereof) there is no doubt in its coming; (yet most of 546 mankind) the people of Mecca (believe not) in the coming of the Hour.
